attributes.action: democratise the BBC.  One licence one vote!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For too long the British public have tolerated the decline of our once great BBC. Jonathan Ross's arrogant claim to be worth a thousand lost jobs is the last straw.  British TV was once a cause for pride, now it is a source of shame.

BBC management, committed to multicultural mediocrity and the cult of  celebrity, have betrayed our trust.  We demand regime change! 

In the future, the Board of the Trust must be chosen by licence payers, instead of the metropolitan  establishment.

We call for the Government to introduce legislation to institute such change forthwith.
